original_text: And before the chambers was a passage inward, ten cubits wide and a hundred cubits long, and their doors were on the north.
korean_text: 그 두 방 사이에 통한 길이 있어 너비는 열 척이요 길이는 백 척이며 그 문들은 북쪽을 향하였으며

sentences.original_text: And before the chambers was a passage inward
sentences.korean_translation: 그 방들 앞에는 안으로 들어가는 통로가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: ten cubits wide and a hundred cubits long
sentences.korean_translation: 너비는 십 규빗이고 길이는 백 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: and their doors were on the north
